p: The performance of the assay was evaluated by testing serial dilutions of quantified synthetic control RNAs provided by the manufacturer. In addition, serial dilutions of supernatants of Vero cells infected by the Asian and ECSA lineages of CHIKV were tested in quadruplicate using the same extraction kit and the same amplification protocol as those used for NAT screening of blood donors (biological material provided by the National Reference Center for Arboviruses).
